================================

### Backflow Prevention Project (Invitation to Tender)

#### Reference Number
invoice cb-57-50578922, Solicitation number: 2024-00258, Amendment number: 10

#### Project Overview

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is issuing an invitation to tender for the Backflow Prevention Project at the Ottawa Laboratory (Fallowfield) located at 3851 Fallowfield Road, Nepean, ON K2H 8P9. This project involves the installation of backflow prevention devices to ensure the safety and quality of the water distribution system.

#### Summary of Work

The scope of work includes the design, installation, testing, and commissioning of backflow prevention devices in accordance with the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) standards. The Contractor must perform and complete the work within 14 weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

#### Mandatory Site Visit

A site visit has been scheduled for October 25, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. Interested bidders are required to meet at the front entrance of the Ottawa Laboratory (Fallowfield) to participate in the site visit.

#### Submissions

Bid submissions must be made only to the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) Bid Receiving, as indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation.

#### Contract Terms and Conditions

The contract will be awarded to the bidder who offers the lowest price. The successful bidder is required to submit a Performance Bond and a Labour and Material Payment Bond as per the requirements outlined in the contract.

### Award and Contract Administration

The contract will be awarded on the basis of a competitive bidding process. The CFIA reserves the right to terminate or cancel the contract at any time and to reject any or all bids.

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: October 11, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 16, 2023 at 2:00 P.M. (Eastern Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 20, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or questions, please contact Ashley Bennett at (343) 553-9512 or Ashley.Bennett@inspection.gc.ca. All communications must be made in writing and will be addressed promptly.
